channel.title: RuneScape 2 Chronos
channel.description:
Well this is my first attempt at doing anything myself (for reals) so don't be too hard on me (lol). This is a scratch project.
UppIt: (new: http://uppit.com/v/WT3XK315) Rand class (ISAAC): http://pastebin.com/f7f2c5d56
Features: - Netty implementation - Login block - Gtfo if you srsly want a list :D - Services
Pictures: lol u srs? [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/1e85s5.jpg[/img] ^ - obviously not a real client connection, i wrote up a test client in like 2 mins to test it but yeah same difference
edit: [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/oh4x05.jpg[/img] Serious client connection.

item.title: RuneScape 2 Chronos

Badass… Omg… Lol nice

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 2 Chronos
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

jmood128:

By use I would say Mini is since it is used more then Netty, most of the scratches out there use either Mini or Netty. So I would think its hard to tell.

I know Mina is used more, its basically Nio in a wrapper, and is used in rs2dv, 377d, hyperion, rs2hd, and riotscape.
I could have sworn that Netty, and Grizzly were both slightly faster than Mina when running more threads.

Xsocket is basically equal to netty performance-wise though, and its just NIO aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape 2 Chronos
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“glestrts, post:8, topic:339746”]took a quick look at it, excellent use of documentation, packaging, and naming, you would be surprised at some of the naming I have seen.

I don’t know anything about netty, just thats its a Networking Api. Its also better than Mina right?[/quote]

By use I would say Mini is since it is used more then Netty, most of the scratches out there use either Mini or Netty. So I would think its hard to tell.

Read full topic

item.description:

took a quick look at it, excellent use of documentation, packaging, and naming, you would be surprised at some of the naming I have seen.

I don’t know anything about netty, just thats its a Networking Api. Its also better than Mina right?

item.description:
@xJaws wrote:

Well this is my first attempt at doing anything myself (for reals) so don’t be too hard on me (lol). This is a scratch project.

UppIt: (new: http://uppit.com/v/WT3XK315)
Rand class (ISAAC): http://pastebin.com/f7f2c5d56

Features:

  • Netty implementation
  • Login block
  • Gtfo if you srsly want a list
  • Services
